name: Black Forest
description: Black Forest is a turn-based multiplayer game about cooperation and betrayal. A resource-management strategy game about survival and despair. It is set in the dark and dangerous Black Forest in medieval Germany.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64 bit Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: any DX9 or better graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
